Jatz... you know... French?
Yes, I live in the french part of Canada. English is actually my 2nd language...

> 
> Yes, I live in the french part of Canada. English is actually my 2nd language...

Well then, you are more intelligent than I. Good sir.
I strive to believe you speak Latin.

Canada is fun, but I wish I could learn french. My french teacher was kinda strange..... (I wounder if they still require you to learn it in this part of canada? Im sure no one really did in my class =P )
It\'s not mandatory to learn it, but you still have french classes like anywhere else that encourage it. If you go to an english school, it\'s not as important though.
